title: Beer O'Clock Watch Face
summary: A hard earned thirst needs a watch face to match it.
developerAddress:

5th Floor
New York, NY 10023
description: Beer O'Clock is now Free for all. Everyone should know the most important time of the day.Finally! A watch face for the most important part of the day. Beer O'Clock.The Beer O'Clock watch face comes feature packed with the following features:  • Vibration when its time to get that first frosty beverage  • Configurable Start and End hours  • Motion effects and animations that simulate a real beer in order to fully set the mood  • Swap between regular mortal time or a countdown until the start/end of Beer O'ClockRemember .. descriptionHTML:
Beer O'Clock is now Free for all. Everyone should know the most important time of the day.

Finally! A watch face for the most important part of the day. Beer O'Clock.

The Beer O'Clock watch face comes feature packed with the following features:

• Vibration when its time to get that first frosty beverage
• Configurable Start and End hours
• Motion effects and animations that simulate a real beer in order to fully set the mood
• Swap between regular mortal time or a countdown until the start/end of Beer O'Clock

Remember .. Beer, like Beer O'Clock, should be enjoyed responsibly.
comments: BEER O'CLOCK! A watch face for the most important time of the day. The motion effects and bubbles are fun and the watch face looks awesome.
Never miss beer o'clock again! When the watch speaks, I listen.
Not much use as a watch. A bit of fun but no use as a watch
recentChanges: We bring to life the perfect watch face for beer aficionados.
